headers.subject: [tosdr:2422] Skype Education has a broad copyright license

html:
Title: Skype Education has a very broad copyright license on your content

Topic: copyright-scope

Summary: Skype defines 'content' very broadly: any text, sounds, pictures, photos, video, hypertext links and/or any type of information, comments, suggestions or ideas. They go on to say that you grant Skype, it's affiliates, and agents a non-exclusive sub-licensable and transferable license.

Score: 80 (mediocre)

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
